note_chs: 根据不同动作情况有不同用法。
note_en: Depending on the situation an action can have different uses.

note_chs: 歇後語「死頂」；明知自己錯咗，但為咗面子都要死撐、唔認錯，就算俾人睇穿咗都會死口唔認或者夾硬兜。
note_en: to refuse to admit that oneself is at fault by arguing and defending even when the truth is obvious; literally "the dead chicken props up the lid of rice-cooker".
